Layout/EmptyLinesAroundClassBody.description:
Description

Keeps track of empty lines around class bodies.
Layout/EmptyLinesAroundClassBody.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: no_empty_lines (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['empty_lines', 'empty_lines_except_namespace', 'empty_lines_special', 'no_empty_lines', 'beginning_only', 'ending_only'] (type: list)
